thread.title: Birmingham's Jam House up for sale at £3.2m
thread.title_full: Birmingham's Jam House up for sale at £3.2m

title: Birmingham's Jam House up for sale at £3.2m
text:
Britain's Got Talent auditions coming to Birmingham 
Birmingham Properties Group is selling the freehold on the three-storey Georgian property, which includes The Jam House plus adjoining offices at 3 and 5 St Paul’s Square. 
John Bunce, manager of The Jam House, said: “We want to assure our customers that it will be business as usual during and after the sale of the building in which we are housed. What do you think? Be the first to comment 
“We remain committed to providing people with a great night out with live music, good food, and dancing at our Jewellery Quarter premises.” 
John Tebbutt, managing director of BPG, said the sale of The Jam House would enable the company to reinvest in other development projects. 
“The commercial property sector is extremely buoyant and we are keen to get our plans underway,” he said. Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
